comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://m.search.naver.com/search.naver?sm=mtb_hty.top&where=m&ssc=tab.m.all&oquery=%EC%9D%B4%EC%B2%9C+%ED%85%8C%EB%A5%B4%EB%A9%94%EB%8D%B4&tqi=iGkJkwprfAlssAr1MBCsssssskG-062988&query=%EC%BF%A0%EB%A1%9C%EB%AF%B8](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.search.naver.com%2Fsearch.naver%3Fsm%3Dmtb_hty.top%26where%3Dm%26ssc%3Dtab.m.all%26oquery%3D%25EC%259D%25B4%25EC%25B2%259C%2B%25ED%2585%258C%25EB%25A5%25B4%25EB%25A9%2594%25EB%258D%25B4%26tqi%3DiGkJkwprfAlssAr1MBCsssssskG-062988%26query%3D%25EC%25BF%25A0%25EB%25A1%259C%25EB%25AF%25B8) ### Comment > 전기장판은 더이상 안나오지만 타 상품에서 나오는거 보면 홈플러스처럼 스크립트로 업데이트를 해야할거같아요 ### Screenshots
